column6: BRIAN K. VAUGHAN & ANDY KUBERT - TOGETHER!  "CRY WOLF" PART 2 (OF 4)  It's all about the Ragin' Cajun as the mysterious Gambit gives hints of where he's been, what he wants and why the X-Men will not be happy about it.
column8: | colorist:Frank D'Armata | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller (cover):Andy Kubert | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
